groups.name: domain.disposable
groups.description: Configuration properties for disposable domain checking.

groups.name: domain.disposable.loader
groups.description: Configuration for the disposable domain list loader.

properties.name: domain.disposable.algorithm
properties.description: The algorithm type used for checking disposable domains. Supported values are "BloomFilter" or "SuffixTrie".

properties.name: domain.disposable.loader.type
properties.description: The type of loader to use for the domain list. Supported values are "builtin" or "http".

properties.name: domain.disposable.loader.path
properties.description: The specific path or URL for the domain list. E.g., a URL for 'http' type or a classpath resource for custom types.
